      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • runGenerator

        protected int runGenerator(java.lang.String[] string)
        Process the command line and call the code generator

        Summary of the exit status codes -- 0: normal exit -1: syntax errors exist in source files -2: compilation failed (compiler finds errors in Quingo source files) -3: not find 'main' operation -4: compiler collapses (due to a bug in the source code) -5: command-line error

        Parameters:
        string - the command arguments
        Returns:
        exit code
